channel.title: Blog on Jay Ong
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Jay Ong

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is my first blog post on a content publishing engine. I’ve been dawdling about using Jeykll for starting up a personal blog, but have never invested enough time into doing it. One day, I stumbled upon a Hugo-built site on Hacker News, and decided to finally jump the gun to doing it. I found Hugo significantly easier to use and set up; I managed to get this up and running in under an hour.
